name: Procrastination Simulator 2018
description:
----------------

Procrastination Simulator is an interactive fiction in which you're an aspiring game developer who haven't completed any project yet. Will you work on your project, or get distracted by the many distractions on the way?

2018 Ver. is an updated version of this IF, and backgrounds have been added to make the experience more than %100 better than it was. It's also an open source project. you can fork your own version of the game. You can play the old version here.
